title: affiliate program
extract: An affiliate program is an automated electronic program that involves a Web advertiser and recruited webmasters. The webmasters, as affiliates, place the company's advertisements on their individually owned websites. The ads in affiliate programs are linked to company websites and are referred to as affiliate links.
extract_html: An affiliate program is an automated electronic program that involves a Web advertiser and recruited webmasters. The webmasters, as affiliates, place the company's advertisements on their individually owned websites. The ads in affiliate programs are linked to company websites and are referred to as affiliate links.
